entry.title: Zytec - Germ Buster Gel Hand Sanitizer Pro 70% Alcohol - 100 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 3.49

Product Description

This sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 100 ml bottle. It’s 70% alcohol gel formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria. It’s aloe and Vitamin E enriched formula makes it safe and soft for use on hands.

Features

  • 100 ml  bottle
  • Contains 70% alcohol
  • Kills harmful germs and bacteria
  • Enriched with aloe, vitamin E and additional moisturizers
  • Safe to use on hands
  • Dries quickly
  • Does not require wiping or rinsing
  • Leaves no residue behind
  • Ideal for home, office, and gyms
  • Made in Canada

Product Description

This extra strength sanitizer by Zytec comes in a convenient 500 ml aerosol spray bottle. Its extra strength formula is strong enough to kill germs and bacteria on surfaces, and safe to use on hands. With 80% alcohol content, and fast action drying, this formula will help protect you and your family.

Features

  • Contains 80% alcohol

entry.title: Zytec - All Purpose Disinfectant Spray Refill Lemon Scent - 3.78 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Zytec
Type: Disposables
Price: 26.99

Product Description

Product Details

Zytec Germ Buster All-Purpose Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill kills harmful bacteria and may be used at home or at offices, schools, health care facilities, hospitals and other commercial and institutional settings.

  • Disinfectant Pump Spray Refill which may be applied on hard, nonporous, environment and inanimate object surfaces

entry.title: MC - Microporous Coverall 50 gsm Silk Fibroin - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: MC
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.99

MC - Silk Fibroin Microporous Coverall 50 gsm - Each

The disposable coveralls are made with 50 gsm Microporous material to protect from external contaminants.

As part of your personal protective equipment (PPE) is designed to cover the whole body and your clothing to protect against dirt and dust, paint, external particles, outside contaminants or hazardous materials such as asbestos, lead paint and many other materials.

Fabricated to combine protection, long lasting protection against wear and tear, and breathability

Our coveralls are one piece and loose fitting for ease of movement, with sleeves, full leggings and a hood to cover the head.

entry.title: Hillman - Yes We're Open / Sorry We're Closed Sign 2 Sided - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hillman
Type: Disposables
Price: 2.19

This Yes We're Open / Sorry We're Closed Sign communicates hours of availability to the public, which is a crucial step in running a successful business. This sign is sure to convey the message clearly and efficiently.

  • Yes We're Open Sorry We're Closed 2 Sided Reversible Sign notifies your clients if you are open or closed for business. The easily reversible sign allows instant update of the open or closed status of your retail outlet. The high contrast lettering ensures high visibility from a distance. Hillman Yes We're Open Sorry We're Closed 2 Sided Reversible Sign has Yes We're Open Sorry We're Closed text in bold red and white against a reflective black background.
  • Sign made of ultra-violet fluorescent ink with large size font for maximum visibility from a distance. Measures 15 x 19 inches.
  • Made using sturdy medium duty Styrene plastic. Styrene is a type of high strength plastic. It is extremely durable, flexible and tear resistant. Withstands most environments and resists fading.

entry.title: CP - Sure 5 RTU Disinfectant Spray Covid-19 Killer - 946 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: CP
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Sure 5 RTU D is a ready to use, one step disinfectant cleaner.  It is effective against a broad spectrum of bacteria, is virucidal, fungicidal and will prevent the growth of mold and mildew and their odours when used as directed on non-food contact surfaces. Sure 5 RTU D will deodorize surfaces in toilet areas, behind and under sinks and counters, garbage cans and garbage storage areas and other areas where bacterial growth can cause malodours. This product is the ready to use version of Sure 5 concentrate, both of which are listed by Health Canada as disinfectants to combat COVID-19.

DIN 02499789

entry.title: Sprakita - Lemon Quat Germicidal Deodorizer & Disinfectant Cleaner - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sprakita
Type: Disposables
Price: 13.99

Contains germicidal ingredients proven highly effective against both gram positive and gram negative bacteria.

Deodorizes by eliminating the cause of the odour. A balanced blend of effective quarternary germicides & non-ionic

detergents with a pleasant citrus fragrance, low foaming, non-staining, and non-toxic in use dilutions.

Bacteriologically stable for long periods of time. Can be used anywhere water can be used.

Directions: For general cleaning and disinfecting use 1 part to 40 parts of water.

For heavy disinfecting use 1 part to 20 parts of water.

                                   AVOID CONTAMINATION OF FOODSTUFFS.  

Sprakita - Lemon Quat Germicidal Deodorizer & Disinfectant Cleaner - 4 x 4 L

entry.title: Lysol - Multi Surface Cleaner Lemon Scent - 4.26 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: Lysol
Type: Disposables
Price: 13.99

DETAILS

  • Use on non-porous surfaces throughout the house and office from kitchens to bathrooms
  • Kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, even when diluted
  • Pourable design can be used directly on stains for spot cleaning or diluted in water for use on large surfaces like floors
  • Cuts grease and grime while deodorizing and disinfecting
  • Use on appliance exteriors, washable walls, countertops, toilet bowl exteriors, bathtubs, showers and doorknobs
Lysol - Multi Surface Cleaner Lemon Scent - 4.26 L
